description.value:
Benevolent light of felines and ponykind, he bids his followers shine with their own light, to warm the path of all those around them.

Edicts strive for your best, help others understand their potential, see the goodness of others, stand firm against darkness of the soul

Anathema forget that life is to be enjoyed, stop others from showing what they have to offer, allow darkness to thrive, be unkind to the good of heart

source.value: Ponyfinder: Races of Everglow Second Edition
